table.name: vtiger_crmmanager
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_crmmanager` ( `crmmanagerid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `crmmanagerno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`crmmanagerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_crmmanagercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_crmmanagercf` ( `crmmanagerid` int(19) NOT NULL, `cmmanager_cf_945` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', `cmmanager_cf_947` varchar(30) DEFAULT '', `cmmanager_cf_949` varchar(50) DEFAULT '', `cmmanager_cf_951` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', `cmmanager_cf_953` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', `cmmanager_cf_955` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', `cmmanager_cf_957` varchar(50) DEFAULT '', `cmmanager_cf_959` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`crmmanagerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
